channel.title: COVID-19 on Development Data Partnership
channel.description: Recent content in COVID-19 on Development Data Partnership

item.title: Understanding the post COVID-19 labor market in Latin America and the Caribbean
item.description: Challenge The Covid-19 Labor Markets Observatory, managed by the Inter-American Development Bank Labor Markets Division, aimed to understand how COVID-19 has affected labor markets in Latin America and the Caribbean.

item.title: Facebookâ€™s Covid-19 Trends and Impact Survey
item.description: With as many as 8 vaccines approved for use around the world the most urgent need now to control the spread of the novel coronavirus is increasing vaccination rates.
